forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 52. West southwest wind around 12 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West wind 10 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening ushers in a gentle calm, the San Francisco skyline appears serene under a canopy of clear night. Tonight, the temperature will nestle comfortably around 52 degrees, and a soft wind from the west southwest, whispering at about 12 miles per hour, encourages a sense of tranquility. The absence of fog paints a nearly unobstructed tapestry that gives promise to the day ahead.

Thursday dawns with a bright disposition, bathing the city in cheerful sunlight as a high near 64 degrees pulls at the curtain of the morning. While the mercury may dip to about 62 by afternoon, expect a refreshing breeze swaying at 10 to 20 miles per hour, with gusts flirting with 25. This delightful bout of weather invites one to dress in light layers—perhaps a breathable sweater or a light jacket to embrace the coolness of the wind. Seize the opportunity to stroll through Golden Gate Park or sip coffee at a street-side café, basking in the vibrant energy of the city while the fog remains at bay, allowing the landmarks of San Francisco to shine in all their glory.
